flawed_nl_solution:
First hour = 66 apples
Second hour = 66(2) = 132 apples
Third hour = 66(1/3) = 198/1 apples
Total number of apples picked 66+132+198/1=<<66+132+198/1=396>>396 apples

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 198/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
